compliant.section: We use cookies to improve your user experience...
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interests - The data controller has a legitimate interest in processing the data because it improves user experience.

compliant.section: Our Privacy & Cookie Policy contains more information...
compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the data subject's rights - The data controller provides clear and concise information about the use of cookies and how to disable them.

non_compliant.section: By continuing to use this website, you agree to our use of cookies.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent - Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous.  Continuing to use a website does not constitute valid consent.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a clear and affirmative action for users to consent to the use of cookies, such as a pop-up banner with an "Accept" button.  Ensure users have the option to refuse cookies without being denied access to the website.
